items.metataghtml: Save 20% on our bestsellers all in one box!
items.storedetaileddescription:
Why Choose The Hits Pack?


 

Variety & Versatility: As a stylist, you know that each client has unique needs. The Hits Pack offers a variety of products, catering to different preferences and lifestyles. Whether your client is into sports, has a special occasion coming up, or prefers a strong bond, this pack has them covered.


 

Comprehensive Solution: The Hits Pack isn't just about adhesives—it's a complete solution. It includes products for both install and removal, making the entire process a hassle-free experience.


 

Customized Recommendations: With multiple adhesives to choose from, you can provide personalized recommendations based on your clients' preferences and activities. This level of customization showcases your expertise and care, which helps strengthen your relationship with clients.
items.outofstockbehavior: Disallow back orders but display out-of-stock message
items.featureddescription:
Please see each product listing for specific cautions.


Flammable – Do not store or use near heat, sparks, or open flame. Use in a well-ventilated area. Close lid tightly. Do not apply to broken, cut, or irritated skin. External use only, do not ingest. Avoid eye contact. Keep out of reach of children. Test on a small area before use. Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F).
